Swipe your Loyalty Card at the checkout or enter the card number online when you shop at Cake Room to earn rewards.
You'll get a certain amount of points for every product you purchase with us. Every 100 points gets you a $10 Free Purchase! Starting June 2018, these rewards will be loaded onto your Loyalty Card.
As soon as you have earned a Free Purchase it will be loaded onto your nominated Loyalty Card (we’ll notify you by email when it’s available.) Simply use it when you want in-store, at the self-checkout and online, or save it for up to 12 months.
There's no limit to how many rewards you can earn. The more you shop with us, the more you'll save!
